ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:28}); // Elmyra
“That glow in your eyes…
you're from SOLDIER, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:29}); // {Cloud}
“Yeah.
Or, I used to be…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:30}); // Elmyra
“…
I don't know how to say this, but…”{PAUSE}“could you please leave here tonight,
without telling {Aeris}?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:71}); // {Barret}
“Marlene!!
{Aeris} was caught
because of Marlene!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:72}); // {Barret}
“I'm sorry.
Marlene's my daughter.
I'm really sorry…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:73}); // Elmyra
“You're her father!?
How in the world could you ever leave
a child alone like that!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:74}); // {Barret}
“…Please don't start with that.
I'm always thinkin' about what
might happen to Marlene, if I…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:75}); // {Barret}
“But you gotta understand somethin'…
…I don't got any answers.
I wanna be with Marlene…
But I gotta fight.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:76}); // {Barret}
“'Cause if I don't…the Planet's gonna die.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:77}); // {Barret}
“So I'm gonna keep fightin'!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:78}); // {Barret}
“But inside I'm always thinkin' of her.
I just wanna be with her…always.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:79}); // {Barret}
“See? I'm goin' in circles, now.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:80}); // Elmyra
“…I think I know what you mean.
She's upstairs asleep,
Why don't you go and see her?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:87}); // {Cloud}
“We're going right into Shinra Headquarters.
…You gotta be prepared for the worst.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:89}); // {Tifa}
“Right now, I feel I have to
push myself to the limit.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:90}); // {Tifa}
“If I stayed here…I'd go crazy.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:91}); // {Barret}
“Sorry, but can you take care
of Marlene a bit longer?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:92}); // Elmyra
“Yes, I don't mind.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:93}); // {Barret}
“This place is dangerous now.
You better go somewhere else.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:94}); // Elmyra
“…You're right.
But promise me that you'll
come back to her.
Don't get yourself killed.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:81}); // {Tifa}
“It's my fault…
I was the one who got
{Aeris} involved in this.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:82}); // Elmyra
“Don't say that.
{Aeris} doesn't think so.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:95}); // Elmyra
“I mean it, come back to her.
Don't get yourself killed.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:97}); // {Cloud}
“I think I can take care of it.”

dialogStrings:
{Aeris}
“I'm home, Mom.”

{Cloud}
“Yeah.”
{Cloud}
{Aeris}
{Aeris}

Elmyra
“That glow in your eyes…
you're from SOLDIER, right?”

{Cloud}
“Yeah.
Or, I used to be…”

Elmyra
“…
I don't know how to say this, but…”{PAUSE}“could you please leave here tonight,
without telling {Aeris}?”

Elmyra
“SOLDIER…the last thing {Aeris}
needs is to get hurt again.”
{Cloud}

{Cloud}
“It's amazing how she's avoided
the Shinra for all these years…”

Elmyra
“The Shinra need her,
so I guess they wouldn't harm her.”

{Tifa}
“But why now?”

Elmyra
“She brought a little girl
here with her.”{PAUSE}“Tseng found them on their way here.
She probably wasn't fast
enough to get away.”{PAUSE}“She decided to go to the Shinra in
exchange for the little girl's safety.”

{Cloud}
“…Marlene.”

{Barret}
“Marlene!!
{Aeris} was caught
because of Marlene!?”

{Barret}
“I'm sorry.
Marlene's my daughter.
I'm really sorry…”

Elmyra
“You're her father!?
How in the world could you ever leave
a child alone like that!?”

{Barret}
“…Please don't start with that.
I'm always thinkin' about what
might happen to Marlene, if I…”

{Barret}
“But you gotta understand somethin'…
…I don't got any answers.
I wanna be with Marlene…
But I gotta fight.”

{Barret}
“'Cause if I don't…the Planet's gonna die.”

{Barret}
“So I'm gonna keep fightin'!”

{Barret}
“But inside I'm always thinkin' of her.
I just wanna be with her…always.”

{Barret}
“See? I'm goin' in circles, now.”

Elmyra
“…I think I know what you mean.
She's upstairs asleep,
Why don't you go and see her?”

{Tifa}
“It's my fault…
I was the one who got
{Aeris} involved in this.”

Elmyra
“Don't say that.
{Aeris} doesn't think so.”

{Tifa}
“I feel so depressed.”

Elmyra
“…sigh…”

{Tifa}
“You're going after {Aeris}, right?”

{Tifa}
“I'm coming with you.”

{Cloud}
“We're going right into Shinra Headquarters.
…You gotta be prepared for the worst.”

{Tifa}
“I know.”

{Tifa}
“Right now, I feel I have to
push myself to the limit.”

{Tifa}
“If I stayed here…I'd go crazy.”

{Barret}
“Sorry, but can you take care
of Marlene a bit longer?”

Elmyra
“Yes, I don't mind.”

{Barret}
“This place is dangerous now.
You better go somewhere else.”

Elmyra
“…You're right.
But promise me that you'll
come back to her.
Don't get yourself killed.”

Elmyra
“I mean it, come back to her.
Don't get yourself killed.”
{Aeris}'s House

{Cloud}
“I think I can take care of it.”
